html:
** Hydrogen fuel-cell company's PLUG.O shares up 1% at $28.42 premarket

** Brokerage Keybanc starts coverage on PLUG with "overweight" rating and PT of $40

** Says PLUG has one of the largest businesses compared to its public peers, and enjoys strong corporate partnerships with large companies including Amazon.com AMZN.O, Home Depot HD.N, General Motors GM.N and Walmart WMT.N

** PLUG, which has never generated any free cash flow, has been able to amass $3.5 bln in cash on its balance sheet through several large equity financing deals over the last few years - Keybanc

** Stock down ~30%, as of Tuesday, since it last reported results on Nov. 4


(Reporting by Akash Sriram in Bengaluru)

(( Akash.Sriram@thomsonreuters.com ;))
